original_title: When the Moon Was Twice as Big
overview: In 1969, ten-year-old Jack is inspired by a unique friend to follow his heart and become an astronomer. But fate alters his course. In 2009 and about to turn fifty, Jack faces a choice: keep going through the motions â€“ or take a giant leap of faith.
